studyMetadata.title: Visualization literacy assessment
studyMetadata.description: An experiment to test gpt generated visualization questions

uiConfig.studyEndMsg: Thank you for completing the study. Your completion code is: C1COY6LS

response.prompt: Please indicate your agreement to the consent form by clicking the checkbox below.

bubble_chart_with_cluster-identify_clust.instruction: Which group of countries forms a cluster on the bubble chart based on their GDP and Inflation rates?
Which School ID(s) represent a cluster of data points on the education bubble chart?
Where is the cluster of data points located on the bubble chart comparing Energy Consumption to CO2 Emissions?

response.correctAnswer: (B) In the upper right quadrant with high Energy Consumption and high CO2 Emissions

options.label: In the lower left quadrant with low Energy Consumption and low CO2 Emissions

options.value: In the center of the chart with moderate Energy Consumption and CO2 Emissions

options.value: There is no visible cluster of data points on the chart

tree_map-locate_value-innovation.instruction: Which subsector has the smallest percentage allocation in the innovation sectors tree map?

at1.instruction: This question is very simple. When we ask about the topic you spent the most time on, you must select *Rocket Science*. This is an attention check. Based on what you just read, which topic have you been asked to select?

response.prompt: Your answer (do not skip more than 3 times)

at2.instruction: This question is about hobbies. When asked to select an interesting hobby from the list, you must select *Reading*. This is an attention check.Based on what you just read, which hobby have you been asked to select?

response.prompt: Your answer (do not skip more than 3 times)

at3.instruction: This question is about a particular city. This magical city M can alter time, and, in order to accomplish more in a day, city M changed its time so there are 48 hours in a day. When asked for the number of hours in a day for city M, you must select *48*. This is an attention check.Based on what you just read, how many hours have you been asked to select?

response.prompt: Your answer (do not skip more than 3 times)
